original_text: It is like when a man begins a journey. Before the master leaves his house, he gives authority to his servants. He tells each servant about the work that he should do. Then he tells the servant at the door to watch for his master's return.
korean_text: 가령 사람이 집을 떠나 타국으로 갈 때에 그 종들에게 권한을 주어 각각 사무를 맡기며 문지기에게 깨어 있으라 명함과 같으니

sentences.original_text: It is like when a man begins a journey.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 한 사람이 여행을 시작할 때와 같습니다.

sentences.original_text: Before the master leaves his house,
he gives authority to his servants.
He tells each servant about the work
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 각 종에게 일에 대해서 말합니다.

sentences.original_text: Then he tells the servant at the door
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 문에 있는 종에게 말합니다.

sentences.original_text: to watch for his master's return.
